constructor-arg.value:
select a.id as memberId, a.login_name as loginName, a.login_email as loginEmail, a.lifecycle as lifeCycle, a.login_mobile as loginMobile, a.source as source, a.type as type, b.id as memberPersonalId, b.user_pic as userPic, b.nickname as nickName, b.local_real_name as localRealName, b.intel_real_name as intelRealName, b.sex as sex, b.blood_type as bloodType, b.birthday as birthday, b.marriage as marriage, b.country as country, b.province as province, b.city as city, b.AREA as area, b.COUNTRY_ID as countryId, b.PROVINCE_ID as provinceId, b.CITY_ID as cityId, b.AREA_ID as areaId, b.address as address, b.credentials_type as credentialsType, b.credentials_no as credentialsNo, b.email as email, b.mobile as mobile, b.QQ as QQ, b.weibo as weibo, b.weixin as weixin, b.edu as edu, b.industy as industy, b.position as position, b.salary as salary, b.working_life as workingLife, b.company as company, b.interest as interest, b.postcode as postcode, b.short2 as short2, b.short3 as short3, b.short4 as short4, b.short5 as short5, c.id as memberConductId, c.cumulative_con_amount as cumulativeConAmount, c.login_count as loginCount, c.login_ip as loginIp, c.login_time as loginTime, c.pay_time as payTime, c.register_ip as registerIp, c.register_time as registerTime
from t_mem_member a, t_mem_personal_data b, t_mem_conduct c where a.id=b.id and a.id=c.id and a.lifecycle!=2 and a.id=:memberId
select * from T_MEM_PERSONAL_DATA where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_MEM_PERSONAL_DATA where lifecycle !=2

update T_MEM_PERSONAL_DATA set lifecycle=:state where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
update T_MEM_PERSONAL_DATA set lifecycle=2 where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
